version.description: Set the version of the font to install.

installFontconfig.description: Set to true to install Font Configuration.

installVariableTTF.description: Set to true to install the variable TTF version of the font.

installVariableWOFF2.description: Set to true to install the variable WOFF2 version of the font.

installStaticTTF.description: Set to true to install the static TTF version of the font.

installStaticOTF.description: Set to true to install the static OTF version of the font.

installStaticWOFF2.description: Set to true to install the static WOFF2 version of the font.
